description:
I can't escape the fact that Rush looks a bit like Clark Kent, with his Brill Creme hair, shy smiles, and perhaps a little clumsy.
Though his body is not from Krypton, he has been on a kick to get in better shape, and I think he is looking pretty dang good considering the weight he says he lost.
He was very shy during the photo shoot, but geez, when I turned on the video cameras, he literally turned into a super man!
Very engaging with the camera and it has that "you are there and he is looking right at you" feel to it.
I like this kid, very sweet and humble, straight out of Smallville.
If you are a fan of pre-cum, you will love the way his dick keeps producing it. Mostly during the photos, but we did get a video moment when he showcased that extra ooze!
He's not sure about getting a blow job, but I think it would be a waste to not get him to come back given how into the solo he was.
title: Rush - Solo
